channel.title: Can i get unbanned?
channel.description:
can i get unbanned if i have been banned for botting about 3-4 months ago [b]Permenantly banned[/b] i can submit any more appeals cant do nothing
have any of u guys ever got unbanned form a perm ban?

item.title: Can i get unbanned?
item.dc:creator: @i_have_an_ax i have an ax
item.description:
@i_have_an_ax wrote:

k0 twin:

Aren’t they just doing resets for botters now?

They claim that a rollback is an optional tool that they use, and will continue giving perm bans also.
(Sounds like a way for them to make money off bots)

Read full topic

item.title: Can i get unbanned?
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:15, topic:376181”][quote author=Explisionist link=topic=472111.msg3453648#msg3453648 date=1293918791]

As long as you have another appeal option, go right ahead. It may not work though.

@ Explisionist: can you actually call them?

Your suppose to be able to contact the Jagex support line I got the number around here some where. I did that and got just a perm mute instead of ban, and then unmuted during the new CEO.
I guess the number got removed, contact them VIA live chat> http://www.jagex.com/corporate/Contact/contact.ws
[/quote]

Wheres the VIA chat, I’d like to contact them, one of my accounts got literally hacked, and botted on.[/quote]
Thats the closest I can get you http://www.runescape.com/kbase/guid/customer_support The chat use to be on their main page at jagex.com But it seems like they are changing all their stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: Can i get unbanned?
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

[quote=“Explisionist, post:12, topic:376181”][quote author=whattehp406 link=topic=472111.msg3453652#msg3453652 date=1293918859]

As long as you have another appeal option, go right ahead. It may not work though.

@ Explisionist: can you actually call them?

Your suppose to be able to contact the Jagex support line I got the number around here some where. I did that and got just a perm mute instead of ban, and then unmuted during the new CEO.
I guess the number got removed, contact them VIA live chat> http://www.jagex.com/corporate/Contact/contact.ws
[/quote]wow perm mute
that’s … wtf?

Its messed up I know. But I got use to it, I got the perm mute right when skill capes came out, didn’t know I was muted, started asking this dude how he got his cape and he never answered and he was wcing so i reported for botting lul… Later that year the “your account is muted” thing showed up…[/quote]lawl

Read full topic

item.title: Can i get unbanned?
item.dc:creator: @3d3r 3d3r
item.description:
@3d3r wrote:

k0 twin:

Aren’t they just doing resets for botters now?

I got set back awhiile ago. I had 94 fishing and 86 cooking. they both went back to 10 and they to 2 or less levels off all the other skills. Had 99 str and now 98. 500k away. atleast its better than getting banned. Still Sucks.

Read full topic

item.title: Can i get unbanned?
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

A permanent ban won’t be undone. When the new CEO took over all the bans, mutes, etc… Were reset as a ‘new’ beginning for Runescape players. The only way you will be unban is if you actually call them, and say something about the whole thing to make yourself sound innocent. Even then you have a possiblity of not getting unban… So don’t get caught botting… Easy enough.

Read full topic
